title: Accepting Friend Request
description: This event ("accept-friend-request") has to be emitted when a user accepts the friend request

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitAcceptFriendRequest

title: Change Friend Request Status
description: This event ("change-status") has to be emitted when a user wants to change the status

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitChangeStatus

title: diconnecting the socket service
description: This event ("disconnect") has to be emitted when a user logout or closes the application.
name: EmitDisconnect

title: Mark Seen
description: This event ("mark-seen") has to be emitted when a user wants to mark the notification as seen

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitMarkSeen

title: Remove Friend from the list
description: This event ("remove-friend") has to be emitted when a user wants unfriend or remove a friend from the list

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitRemoveFriend

title: sending request to user
description: This event ("send-friend-request") has to be emitted when a user sends friend request to another user.

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitSendFriendRequest

title: Setting user online
description: This event ("set-user") has to be emitted when a user comes online.

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitSetUser

title: Undo Deleted Task
description: This event ("undoDelete") has to be emitted when a user wants to undo a deleted task

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitUndodelete

title: Undo Edited Sub Task
description: This event ("undoEditSubTask") has to be emitted when a user wants to undo a Sub Task which was Edited

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitUndoeditsubtask

title: Undo Edited Task
description: This event ("undoEditTask") has to be emitted when a user wants to undo a task which was edited

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitUndoedittask

title: Undo Sub Task
description: This event ("undoNewSubTask") has to be emitted when a user wants to undo a Sub Task which was created

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitUndonewsubtask

title: Undo Deleted Sub Task
description: This event ("undoSubTaskDelete") has to be emitted when a user wants to undo a deleted Sub Task

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitUndosubtaskdelete

title: Undo Sub Task Status
description: This event ("undoSubTaskStatus") has to be emitted when a user wants to undo the status of a Sub Task which was Changed

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitUndosubtaskstatus

title: Undo new Task
description: This event ("undoTask") has to be emitted when a user wants to undo a creted task in todo list

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitUndotask

title: Undo Task Status
description: This event ("undoTaskStatus") has to be emitted when a user wants to undo status of the task which was changed

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitUndotaskstatus

title: event
description: This event ("auth-error") has to be listened to know if any error has occurred on socket.
name: ListenAuthError

title: Verification the init user
description: This event ("verify-user") has to be listened on the user's end to verify user
name: ListenVerifyUser
